Wolfgang Schulz.description: reviewing notes before meeting Ayesha for coffee (conversing about Wolfgang Schulz and Tamara Taylor are discussing how to incorporate jazz music, spoken word performances, involvement of local Black artists and community organizations, reaching out to members of the Black community for input and feedback, exploring Black history and African folklore, highlighting resilience within the Black community, incorporating traditional African music and storytelling, prioritizing active involvement of the Black community, organizing a community gathering, celebrating diversity and heritage of the Black community, educating themselves on Black experiences and systemic inequalities, and establishing a framework for inclusive decision-making and communication to ensure all voices are heard and valued in their project.) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
